name: ext_R4B_EvidenceReport
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.EvidenceReport for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents EvidenceReport from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EvidenceReport|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: The EvidenceReport Resource is a specialized container for a collection of resources and codable concepts, adapted to support compositions of Evidence, EvidenceVariable, and Citation resources and related concepts.
